item.title: Vim for development
item.description: As a developer, I have this never ending thirst for productivity. On the journey of quinching this thirst, a few months ago, I stumbled upon a fantastic lecture on YouTube about Vim. After that, I started to use Vim. It wasn’t my first introduction to Vim though. I first came to know about it about an year ago. Still, I hadn’t been able to use it as my main editor, because of one big problem: the learning curve.
